description:
Add Verdict field to Tick struct in internal/tick/tick.go

Field specification:
- Name: Verdict
- Type: *string (pointer for optional/nullable)
- JSON tag: json:"verdict,omitempty"
- Valid values: null, "approved", "rejected"

Purpose: Human's response to an awaiting state. This field is transient - it gets set by human, then processed immediately, then cleared. The processing logic (in verdict processing epic) determines whether to close the tick or return it to agent.

Verdict meanings:
- null: No response yet (default)
- approved: Human accepts/approves
- rejected: Human rejects, needs changes

Implementation notes:
- Add field after Awaiting field in struct
- Add validation in Validate() method for valid enum values
- Verdict should only be set when Awaiting is also set (semantic validation, not struct validation)
title: Add Verdict field to Tick struct
